report.title: EBMS Visit Summary list
report.description: A list of the number of sites and visits recorded for each species, with filters for user or scheme, this and previous year.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl JOIN occurrences o ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = cttl.id AND o.deleted = false JOIN samples s ON o.sample_id=s.id and s.deleted=false JOIN samples p ON s.parent_id = p.id AND p.deleted = false JOIN locations l ON p.location_id = l.id AND l.deleted = false JOIN cache_termlists_terms ctt on ctt.id=l.location_type_id #joins# WHERE l.location_type_id = #location_type_id# AND #website_filter#

wheres.where: p.date_end >= CAST(extract(YEAR from NOW())||'-01-01' as date)
p.date_end >= CAST((extract(YEAR from NOW())-1)||'-01-01' as date) AND p.date_start <= CAST((extract(YEAR from NOW())-1)||'-12-31' as date)

param.name: data
param.lookup_values: mine:My data,scheme:All scheme data,section:All section data

joins.join: JOIN location_attribute_values lav on l.id = lav.location_id AND lav.location_attribute_id = #country_location_attribute_id# AND lav.int_value = #country_id# AND lav.deleted = false

param.name: user_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the user

param.name: country_location_attribute_id
param.description: The ID of the location_attribute that assigns a location to a country

param.name: country_id
param.description: Enter the Indicia ID of the country
